constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission 20/03217/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:ST-365-PL-D-107-B - Site Location Plan BST-365-PL-D-108-B - Block Plan BST-365-PL-D-101-E - Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plan EST-365-PL-D-102-D - Existing and Proposed First Floor Plan DST-365-PL-D-103-C - Existing and Proposed Roof and Loft Floor Plan CST-365-PL-D-104-C - Existing and Proposed Rear Elevation and Sections A-A, B-B, C-CST-365-PL-D-106-C - Existing and Proposed Front and Side Elevations CST-365-PL-D-105-C - Existing and Proposed Side Elevation CReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 21/03217/HOU (Erection of a single storey rear extension, first floor rear extension, increasing the angle of the existing sloping tiled roof and a loft extension with new front, rear and side dormers and roof light to facilitate loft conversion, alterations to the front elevation fenestration and new front porch) to show correct position of existing adjacent building on floor plans.
